data.title: Mirage Football
data.meta_description: Posts about Chelsea FC written by Shivam
data.text:
Chelsea have had a mixed bag of results lately to say the least, a comprehensive win over Schalke then a stuttering draw against West Brom. Then easily brushing past the bubble blowing brigade only to be shut down in Switzerland … Continue reading →

Frank Lampard, to me, is Chelsea’s greatest player ever. Consistently for the last twelve seasons he has shown what an asset he is with his goals, his assists and most importantly his leadership. No matter what the occasion Lampard will … Continue reading →
